Extended Licence \The Extended License grants you, the purchaser, an ongoing, non-exclusive, worldwide license to make use of the digital work (Item) you have selected. You are licensed to use the Item to create one single End Product for yourself or for one client (a “single application”), and the End Product may be Sold. 


Regular LICENCE \The Regular License grants you, the purchaser, an ongoing, non-exclusive, worldwide license to make use of the digital work (Item) you have selected. You are licensed to use the Item to create one single End Product for yourself or for one client (a “single application”), and the End Product can be distributed for Free..
